item.title: Speed up the Catalog Import process
item.description: The performance of the current Catalog import in XC9 update-2 is not so good. This article gives a few tips on how to speed up the import process. After applying these optimizations, importing a sellable item costs about 13 msec. Do not use the ICreateRelationshipPipeline and limit IPersistEntityPipeline usage The ICreateRelationshipPipeline is expensive; do not use it. Instead create the relations yourself. item.title: Programmatically adding Entity Composer templates
item.description: The XC9 Entity Composer functionality is introduced in update-2, and this article describes the concept and explains how to add Entity Composer templates using the Business Tools. In this article we describe how to programmatically add Entity Composer templates. This is for example useful when writing your own catalog importer. Creating a template, adding it to a sellable item, and filling a property value requires the following steps: Create an Entity Composer template Add an item definition to the catalog Link template to an item definition Set a property value for a sellable item Link the entity view to the Entity Composer template The next sections describe each step in detail.
